trans-unit.source: Welcome to Clew! Clew helps you navigate and explore indoor spaces by using your phone's camera and inertial sensors. It acts as a 'sighted companion' that helps guide you along a route by providing audio directions and cues. Clew works best within indoor spaces, where GPS doesn't work or is unreliable.
trans-unit.note: Text on the first page of the tutorial that describes Clew
Intro to Clew Tutorial Title Title for Clew Intro
No comment provided by engineer.

trans-unit.source: The procedure for pausing the route and recording an anchor point are the same. The key idea is that in order to reuse routes, your phone must be able to align its current position with a position from the recorded route. In some cases, Apple's ARKit will be able to automatically do this alignment (for example, when the camera sees a distinctive visual feature that can be matched to the recording); however, in many situations this will not be possible.
trans-unit.target: تعتبر عملية الايقاف المؤقت للطريق وتسجيل نقطة ثابتة بمثابة الشيء نفسه. تكمن الفكرة الرئيسية بأنك عندما تود استخدام الطريق المسجل مرة أخرى، يجب عليك وضع الهاتف بنفس الطريقة التي قمت بتسجيل الطريق بها. في بعض الأحيان، سيقوم الواقع المعزز الخاص بApple بعمل هذا الأمر تلقائيا، (على سبيل المثال، عندما تلتقط الكاميرا ميزة بصرية ظاهرة، فيمكن مطابقتها مع التسجيل) وفي معظم الأوقات يكون هذا الأمر غير متاح.
trans-unit.note: This is a content paragraph in the Pausing a Route or Recording a Anchor Point section of the help menu which talks about why an allignment process is necessary

trans-unit.source: In order to align your position in such cases you must be able to place the phone in a position and orientation such that you can reliably return the phone to that same position and orientation when reloading a saved route. While it is not crucial that you position the phone in exactly the same place (although the more accurately you can do this, the better the app will work), you must be able to place the phone in precisely the same orientation. To make it easy to return the phone to the same orientation, you should hold your phone flat with the screen facing up and press the top (short-edge) of your phone flush with a vertical surface (like a wall). More instructions are provided in the app when you activate the pause feature or the create anchor point feature.
trans-unit.target: ولكي تتمكن من عمل هذا الأمر بشكل جيد، يجب عليك وضع الهاتف باتجاه ثابت، بحيث يمكنك العودة لهذا الاتجاه عندما ترغب في إعادة تحميل الطريق المحفوظ مسبقا. فليس من الضروري وضع الهاتف في نفس المكان بالضبط (فكلما فعلت ذلك جيدا، سيعمل التطبيق بشكل أفضل)، ويجب عليك أن تكون قادرا دوما على وضع الهاتف باتجاه ثابت. ولتسهيل عملية إعادة الهاتف إلى نفس الاتجاه، يجب عليك وضع هاتفك بشكل ثابت، ثم وجه الشاشة لأعلى واضغط على الجزء العلوي (الزاوية القصيرة من الهاتف). سيتم عرض المزيد من المعلومات داخل التطبيق عند تفعيل ميزة الإيقاف المؤقت أو ميزة إنشاء النقطة الثابتة.
trans-unit.note: This is the second paragraph in the Pausing a Route and Recording a Anchor Point section of the help menu. This paragraph discusses the process of creating a Anchor Point including reasoning for why a Anchor Points are necessary and some tips for most effective use of the feature.

trans-unit.source: Voice notes allow you to record a landmark or leave specific information that you want to hear later when navigating in the return direction. To leave a voice note:
trans-unit.note: Instruction for how to add a landmark paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Tap the voice note button at any time that you are recording a route. The app will then open the voice recorder. Press the record button to leave a voice memo.
trans-unit.note: Instruction for how to add a landmark paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: Tap the stop recording button and resume recording your route.
trans-unit.note: Instruction for how to add a landmark paragraph 3

trans-unit.source: When you navigate your route, Clew will play your voice note when you pass through your recorded landmark. You can record as many voice notes as you want.
trans-unit.note: Instruction for how to add a landmark paragraph 4
Title for the add a landmark section of the tutorial

trans-unit.source: While you were recording this route, the app determined that your phone's rear camera was not pointing straight ahead. When navigating the recorded route, if your phone is not pointing straight ahead, the app's directional guidance may be confusing. If it is difficult for you to keep you phone pointing straight ahead, the app can automatically adjust its guidance so that it is relative to your body rather than the phone's direction. Would you like enable this feature? You can always disable this feature in the settings menu under "Correct Offset of Phone / Body." Important details of this feature are available in the help menu.
trans-unit.target: عند قيامك بتسجيل هذا الطريق, لاحظ التطبيق بأن الكاميرا الخلفية لهاتفك لم تكن موجهة للأمام مباشرة. وبما أن هاتفك لم يكن موجها للأمام مباشرة، فعند التنقل في الطريق المسجل، ربما تخطئ الاتجاهات قليلا. إذا كان من الصعب عليك وضع الهاتف في اتجاه ثابت، فيمكن للتطبيق تعديل اتجاهاته تلقائيا، بحيث يكون التطبيق معتمدا على جسمك بدلا من كاميرا الهاتف. هل تريد تفعيل هذه الميزة؟ ويمكنك دائما تعطيل هذه الميزة عن طريق قائمة الإعدادات داخل خيار "ضبط موازنة الهاتف مع الجسم." تتوفر معلومات مهمة لهذه الميزة داخل قائمة المساعدة.

trans-unit.source: Please align your device with your previously recorded anchor point. To do this hold your device flat with the screen pointing up. Press the top (short) edge flush with the same vertical surface that you used to create the anchor point. Activating the align button will start an alignment countdown this is intended to give you time to make final adjustments to the positioning of your device. At the end of the countdown the alignment will be taken and the device will provide an announcement indicating that the anchor point was saved.
trans-unit.target: الرجاء محاذة هاتفك مع نفس النقطة الثابتة التي قمت بتسجيلها مسبقًا. وللقيام بذلك، يجب عليك وضع هاتفك بشكل ثابت، ثم وجه الشاشة لأعلى واضغط على الجزء العلوي (الزاوية القصيرة من الهاتف)، استخدم نفس الطريقة المستخدمة عند تسجيل النقطة الثابتة. عند تفعيل زر المحاذاة سيبدأ العد التنازلي للمحاذاة، ويهدف هذا الزر لمنحك الوقت لإجراء التعديلات النهائية على اتجاه جهازك. في نهاية العد التنازلي، سيتم اعتماد اتجاه الجهاز وسيعلمك الهاتف بأنه قد تم حفظ النقطة الثابتة بنجاح.

trans-unit.source: This exercise will have you practice setting an anchor point. Remember to choose a location for your anchor point that you can easily find at some later time. You'll practice setting the anchor point using the physical alignment method. Remember to position your phone flat with the screen facing up against a vertical edge of a wall, or doorframe or a table.
trans-unit.note: Set an anchor point practice page instructions paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Press the Set Anchor Point button, position your phone, and wait for the countdown.
trans-unit.note: Set an anchor point practice page instructions paragraph 2

You could also try pressing the top edge of your phone against a table, wall or doorway and then setting the anchor point. That way when you go to find the spot where you should set the anchor point again, you only have to find a table or wall again and then you know you're at least pretty close.";

trans-unit.source: Setting anchor points is an important skill that is needed in order to save routes or pause navigation. Anchor points allow Clew to record your position and orientation within the route's environment. The anchor point realigns you to the correct path whenever you want to navigate a route that has been saved for later use and they are essential to Clew's navigation accuracy.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for setting anchor points

trans-unit.source: In addition to the auditory guidance that you get when navigating along a route (described previously), there are some additional sounds that help you understand what is currently happening with the app. If you have enabled the speech feedback option in the app settings, each of these sounds is accompanied by speech that briefly explains the sounds meaning. Note that these sounds are not delivered when you are in the help menu (to avoid distracting you while you are reading through the help information).
trans-unit.target: بالإضافة إلى الإشارات الصوتية التي تحصل عليها أثناء تنقلك عبر الطريق، (الموصوفة مسبقا)، تتوفر أيضا مجموعة إضافية من الأصوات التي تساعدك على فهم الإحداث الحالية التي تَحدُث في التطبيق. إذا قمت مسبقا بتفعيل خيار تعليقات الكلام عن طريق إعدادات التطبيق، فسيكون كل صوت من هذه الأصوات مصحوبا بجملة تَِصف المعنا الخاص بالصوت. لاحظ بأن هذه الأصوات لا تصلك عندما تكون في قائمة المساعدة (وذلك لتجنب إزعاجك أثناء تنقلك بين المعلومات).
trans-unit.note: This is a paragraph in the App sounds and their meanings section.
This is a section header in the help documentation

trans-unit.source: Motion tracking warning sound: this sound is a short recording of a stringed instrument playing a slightly scratchy note. This sound indicates that the app's position tracking has been degraded either due to the phone moving too rapidly or due to the environment not having an adequate amount of visual detail. The latter condition occurs if your environment is too dark or if the camera is occluded.
trans-unit.target: صوت تحذير تتبع الحركة: هو عبارة عن مقطع صوتي قصير لآلة وترية خشنة. ويشير هذا الصوت بأن تتبع التطبيق للحركة قد انخفض إما بسبب تحرك الهاتف بسرعة أو بسبب انعدام الضوضاء في المكان. ويحدث هذا الأمر إذا كانت المنطقة مظلمة جدا أو إذا كان مدخل الكاميرا مغلقاً.
trans-unit.note: This is a bullet point which describes the motion tracking warning sound and its meaning

trans-unit.source: Normal motion tracking sound: this sound is a short recording of a brass instrument. It indicates that the app's position tracking has entered into the "normal" state. If the app has just started up this means that the motion tracking is now active. If the app previously experienced diminished accuracy, see next sound description, it means that the motion tracking has recovered. If you hear this sound after loading or resuming a route, this means that ARKit has been able to automatically align the route to the recording.
trans-unit.target: صوت تتبع الحركة العادي: هو عبارة عن صوت آلة نحاسية قصير. ويشير هذا الصوت إلى أن تتبع الحركة في التطبيق هو طبيعياً. إذا بدأ التطبيق للتو، فهذا يعني أن تتبع الحركة نشط. وإذا كان التطبيق قد مرة سابقًا بضعف في الإضاءة، فقرء الوصف الصوتي التالي، فهذا يعني أن تتبع الحركة قد عاد لوضعه الطبيعي. أما إذا استمعت لهذا الصوت بعد تحميل أو استئناف الطريق، فهذا يعني أن الواقع الافتراضي قد تمكن من تعديل المسار تلقائياً.
trans-unit.note: This is a bullet point which describes the normal motion tracking sound and its meaning

trans-unit.source: Clew allows you to record routes using your phone so that you can then navigate them at a later point in time with precise, automatic guidance from the app. Clew can be used in situations where you want to immediately navigate back to your starting location (e.g., if you went somewhere with a sighted guide or if it is harder to navigate the reverse journey) or when you want to remember a route that you are learning so you can navigate it more confidently in the future. Importantly, Clew does not use your phone's GPS, so it can be used indoors.
trans-unit.target: يسمح لك Clew بتسجيل الطرق عن طريق هاتفك والذي يمكنك من استخدامهم في أوقات لاحقة بمصاحبة توجيهات تلقائية ودقيقة من التطبيق. يمكن استخدام Clew لأغراض متعددة، إذا رغبت مثلا بالعودة مجددا إلى نقطة البداية لموقعك، (فعلى سبيل المثال)، إذا خرجت لمكان مع شخص مبصر، أو إذا كان من الصعب عليك العودة مجددا. أو حتى إذا رغبت في تذكر طريق لكي تتعلمه، يمكنك التنقل به بحرية مطلقة في المستقبل. معلومة مهمة: لا يستخدم Clew خدمات تحديد الموقع لهاتفك، فَيتيح لك هذا استخدامه في الأماكن المغلقة.
trans-unit.note: this is a paragraph in the app features section of the help menu which describes the main features of Clew

trans-unit.source: Apple's ARWorld map can help make the process of finding and aligning to a saved anchor point easier. Especially for those that have newer iPhone models and for environments with consistent, artificial lighting, the physical alignment can simply be achieved by holding the phone in the vertical pose. However, we recommend that you be consistent in holding the phone pose and relocalizing yourself as best as possible to the originally saved anchor point in order to ensure the best accuracy from Clew.
trans-unit.note: Text of the AR world map part of the tutorial paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Clew will provide directional cues as soon as you begin navigating a route and to keep oriented correctly. The app will announce directions whenever you pass through a waypoint or virtual crumb. The directional cues include: continue straight, slight right, slight left, turn right, turn left. Clew will also announce when you have reached the end of the route.

trans-unit.source: Clew will make sounds, haptic feedback and provide directional audio cues whenever you are navigating a route. These distinct sounds, feedback and directional cues enable you to navigate the route correctly. They help you know when you are correctly on the path or if you are slightly off the correct path or have completely deviated from the route.
trans-unit.note: Text that explains what it sounds and feels like to be on the path and following the path

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the navigation will depend on how well you can realign yourself to the saved anchor point. To find and realign yourself to a saved anchor point, you should try to position yourself as closely as possible to the exact location of the originally saved anchor point.
trans-unit.note: Text of the finding your anchor point part of the tutorial paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Finding the saved anchor point from the physical alignment requires you to hold your phone in the same horizontal or flat pose, pressing it against the same edge that was used to set the anchor point.
trans-unit.note: Text of the finding your anchor point part of the tutorial paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: Finding the saved anchor point from the visual alignment simply requires you to hold the phone in the vertical pose and realign the camera to the same location that was used to set the original anchor point.
trans-unit.note: Text of the finding your anchor point part of the tutorial paragraph 3
Title of the finding your anchor point part of the tutorial

trans-unit.source: This exercise will have you practice finding and realigning yourself to a saved anchor point. After some time, try returning to the same location of your anchor point. Next realign your phone to the same position.
trans-unit.note: Find anchor point page instructions paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Hold your phone in the same horizontal or flat pose, pressing it against the same edge that was used to set the anchor point.
trans-unit.note: Find anchor point page instructions paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: Press the Find Anchor Point button. Wait for the countdown to complete. The app will provide feedback about how closely aligned you were to the saved anchor point.
trans-unit.note: Find anchor point page instructions paragraph 3
Find anchor point page title

"voiceNotesTutorialInstructionText" = "When recording a saved route, there is a button on the right that allows you to record a voice note. A voice note is a note you can leave yourself, that will play when you go to use the save route that you are recording. It can be any information that is helpful to you, such as noting where a landmark like a doorway or front desk is as you pass, or instructions for your future self. Later when you go to use a save route the voice notes will appear as speaker icons on your path at the point they were recorded. As you pass the note will play.";

trans-unit.source: Once you save a route, it can be found in your Saved Routes List. You can enter the list from the third button on the home screen. From the list click the route that you want to follow, line your phone up with your anchor point and follow the route.

Clew stores all the saved routes within your Saved Routes List. Tap the Saved Routes Button on the Home Screen when you want to navigate a previously saved route. Scroll through the list and tap on the route name.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for finding saved routes paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Select the direction of travel that you wish to navigate. You'll be able to navigate the route from either 'Start-to-End' or in the reverse direction, from 'End-to-Start'. Please be aware of the direction of travel that you wish to navigate.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for finding saved routes paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: Next, find and realign yourself to the corresponding Anchor Point. Finally, wait for the countdown to complete and the navigation will begin.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for finding saved routes paragraph 3

Let user know that the ARKit tracking session has returned to its normal quality (this is played after the tracking has been restored from thir being insuficent visual features or excessive motion which degrade the tracking)

trans-unit.source: Assuming you have enabled sound feedback in the app settings and your iphone doesn't have system sounds muted, the phone will make a beeping sound when it is facing in the correct direction of travel for the route. It is important to keep in mind that this feedback is relative to the direction of the phone, rather than your body. When you achieve a milestone in the route (we call these anchor points), you will hear a different sound effect.
trans-unit.target: على فرض بأنك قمت بتفعيل وصف الأصوات من إعدادات التطبيق وكان الآيفون الخاص بك غير مكتوماً، فعند التنقل عبر الطريق سيصدر الهاتف صفارات صوتية عندما يكون موجها بالاتجاه الصحيح. من المهم الأخذ بعين الاعتبار بأن هذه العلامات مرتبطة بالهاتف بدلا من جسمك. وعند قطع مسافة من الطريق (نسمي هذا بالنقاط الثابتة)، ستستمع لمجموعة من المؤثرات الصوتية المختلفة.

trans-unit.source: By default, Clew provides guidance in reference to the direction your phone is facing. If you have difficulty perceiving your phone's direction, the guidance the app provides may be confusing. If this is an issue for you, you can enable automatic correction of phone / body offset below.
trans-unit.target: يساعدك Clew على التنقل عبر الطريق ويستخدم افتراضياً الاتجاه الخاص بهاتفك. ولِهذا، إذا كنت تسير بشكل مستقيم ولم يكن هاتفك موجهاً إلى الأمام، فمن الممكن أن تكون الاتجاهات التي يزودك بها التطبيق خاطئة. إذا وجدت هذا الأمر صعبا، فيمكنك تفعيل إعداد التصحيح التلقائي لإزاحة الهاتف / الجسم. وعندما يكون هذا الخيار مفعلا، سيستخدم التطبيق بعضا من العلامات أثناء تنقلك ليتأكد من أن هاتفك غير موجه إلى الأمام مباشرةً. (في نفس الجهة التي تتوجه نحوها) إذا لاحظ التطبيق بأن الكاميرا الخلفية لهاتفك لم تكن موجهة للأمام مباشرة، سيقوم التطبيق بتعديل اتجاهاته تلقائيا، بحيث يعتمد التطبيق على جسمك بدلا من اتجاه الهاتف.
trans-unit.note: this is paragraph 1 in the following a route section of the help documentation which describes the functionality of the correct for phone / body offset feature.

trans-unit.source: If you enable this setting, you should scan for the next waypoint by rotating your body while holding your phone fixed (e.g., against braced against your chest).
trans-unit.target: عند استخدامك لخيار التصحيح التلقائي لإزاحة الهاتف / الجسم، فمن الأفضل لك وضع الهاتف مقابل القفص الصدري، ثم قم بالدوران بجسمك للعثور على الاتجاه الصحيح الذي يجب اتباعه (فعند الدوران بجسمك، يجب أن يبقى الهاتف مقابل القفص الصدري ملتفا معك حيثما تذهب.) لاحظ بأن المشي الخلفي والجانبي يؤثر بشكل سلبي على التطبيق وذلك بفصل الارتباط بين الهاتف وجسمك. إذا حدث ذلك، فيمكنك تعطيل هذا الخيار، أو القيام بالمشي للأمام لعدة خطوات وذلك لإعادة حسابات التطبيق.

trans-unit.source: Assuming you have enabled haptic feedback in the app settings and you have an iPhone that supports haptics (iPhone 7 or later should work), the phone will provide haptic vibration when it is facing in the correct direction of travel for the route. It is important to keep in mind that this feedback is relative to the direction of the phone, rather than your body. When you achieve a milestone in the route (we call these anchor points), you will feel a stronger haptic vibration.
trans-unit.target: على فرض بأنك قمت بتفعيل اهتزازات الحس اللمسي من إعدادات التطبيق وكان الآيفون الخاص بك يدعم اهتزازات الحس اللمسي، (آيفون 7 أو أعلى)، عند التنقل عبر الطريق، سيصدر الهاتف اهتزازات لمسية عندما يكون موجها بالاتجاه الصحيح. من المهم الأخذ بعين الاعتبار بأن هذه العلامات مرتبطة بالهاتف بدلا من جسمك. وعند قطع مسافة من الطريق (نسمي هذا بالنقاط الثابتة). ستشعر أيضا باهتزازات لمسية أقوى.

trans-unit.source: Assuming you have enabled speech feedback in the app settings and voice over is on, the phone will provide you with voice directions whenever you encounter an anchor point on your route, start a route, or complete a route. trans-unit.source: While using the app, please be aware of your surroundings. You agree that your use of the App is at your own risk, and it is solely your responsibility to maintain your personal safety. Visit www.clewapp.org for more information on how to use the app.
trans-unit.target: عند استخدامك للتطبيق، الرجاء أخذ الحيطة والانتباه لمحيطك. باستخدامك للتطبيق أنت تقر وتوافق على أن استخدامك للتطبيق يقع ضمن مسؤوليتك الخاصة فقط، فأنت وحدك المسؤول عن حماية سلامتك الشخصية. الرجاء التفضل بزيارة www.clewapp.org للمزيد من المعلومات حول كيفية استخدام التطبيق.

trans-unit.source: Clew relies on the position tracking technology provided by Apple's ARKit. These motion estimates are based on tracking elements in the environment visually (using your phone's camera) and on motion estimates from inertial sensors in your phone. While this technology is advanced, it does not work perfectly. You should expect that over very long routes, particular ones with limited visual features or poor lighting, that the accuracy of the tracking (and hence the app's guidance) will decrease. We have found that Clew works best when you navigate routes along the same direction as they were originally recorded ("Start to End " rather than "End to Start " navigation mode).
trans-unit.target: يعتمد Clew أثناء التنقل على تكنولوجيا الواقع المعزز المقدمة من آبل. ويعتمد تقدير الحركة على الرؤية في المكان (وذلك باستخدام كاميرا الهاتف) ويعتمد التطبيق أيضا على المستشعرات الخاصة بالهاتف. فبالرغم من أن هذه التكنولوجيا متقدما جدا، فهي لا تعمل بشكل احترافي. توقع دائما أثناء تنقلك في الطرق الطويلة انخفاضا في دقة اتجاهات وإرشادات التطبيق وخاصة في الطرق التي تحتوي على رؤية معدومة، أو أضواء خافتة. قد لحظنا بأن Clew يعمل بشكل جيد عند التنقل في الطرق باستخدام نفس الاتجاهات المسجلة مسبقا، فينصح باستخدام وضع التنقل (من البداية للنهاية، بدلا من النهاية للبداية.
trans-unit.note: This is a paragraph in the How well does Clew work? section of the help documentation. This paragraph describes how the app actually works

trans-unit.source: Given the limitations of Clew, you should always use your orientation and mobility skills to ensure your personal safety when using Clew. We are working on additional strategies for improving the accuracy of Clew.
trans-unit.target: عند استخدامك للتطبيق، لا تقم بالاعتماد دائما على Clew, ويجب عليك دائما استخدام مهاراتك الحركية، وتكييف نفسك دائما مع الظروف المحيطة بك للحفاظ على سلامتك الخاصة. نحن نعمل على خلق استراتيجيات إضافية لتحسين دقة Clew.

trans-unit.source: Clew is not a substitute for your orientation and mobility skills. It is not a replacement for your white cane, guide dog or primary mobility aid. Clew is intended to work as an additional aid or to complement and enhance your orientation and navigation skills.

trans-unit.source: Clew helps you find your way around indoors spaces by recording your route when you're going from one place to another. For example, from a lobby area to a room. By recording your route, Clew then helps you navigate your way back to where you started. Clew can help you learn a new environment, so you can confidently navigate it in the future.
trans-unit.note: Text for intro to Using Clew Page Paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Clew is best used indoors. The app doesn't rely on your phone's GPS. This means that Clew is limited in outdoors spaces and for routes over long distances.
trans-unit.note: Text for intro to Using Clew Page Paragraph 2
Title for intro to Using Clew Page

trans-unit.source: This tutorial will help you learn the skills needed to use Clew. Each module focuses on a particular skill set and feature of the app. Some of the modules include interactive practice exercises. We recommend that you first use the app in an indoor setting that is safe and familiar to you.

trans-unit.source: To allow your route to be navigated in the reverse direction you need to record an anchor point for the end of your route. An anchor point records the position and alignment of your device so the app can reload your route from a saved file. As a result the accuracy of your saved route navigation relies entirely on how accurately you can realign and position your phone with your saved anchor point at a later point. We suggest using the text and voice note buttons to record a text note and/or a voice recording which can help you realign your device to the anchor point you recorded at a later time. To create an anchor point, hold your device flat with the screen facing up. Press the top (short) edge flush against a flat vertical surface (such as a wall) the ”align” button starts a %lu-second countdown. The countdown is intended to give you time to position your device; the anchor point will be saved at the end of the countdown.
trans-unit.target: ولكي تتمكن من استخدام الطريق بشكل عكسي، يجب عليك تسجيل نقطة ثابتة في نهاية الطريق. تسجل النقطة الثابتة موقع واتجاه الهاتف الخاص بك، فيمكن للتطبيق إعادة تحميل الطريق عن طريق الملف المحفوظ. ونتيجة لذلك، تعتمد دقة الطريق المحفوظ على مدى قدرتك على المحاذاة ومطابقة الهاتف مع النقطة الثابتة التي تم تسجيلها. ننصحك باستخدام زري النص والملحوظة الصوتية لكتابة ملحوظة أو تسجيلها لمساعدتك على محاذاة الهاتف مع نفس النقطة التي قمت بتسجيلها. وللقيام بتسجيل نقطة ثابتة: يجب عليك وضع هاتفك بشكل ثابت، ثم وجه الشاشة لأعلى واضغط على الجزء العلوي (الزاوية القصيرة من الهاتف) وسيبدأ العد التنازلي. ويهدف العد التنازلي لمنحك الوقت لإجراء التعديلات النهائية على اتجاه جهازك. وسيتم حفظ النقطة الثابتة عندما ينتهي العد التنازلي.
trans-unit.note: Information on how to record an anchor point when used recording the ending anchor point of a multiple use route.

trans-unit.source: In order to immediately navigate back along the path you recorded, press the play button and follow the instructions provided. If you'd like to navigate the route later, you can return to the home screen and load the route you've just saved when you're ready to navigate along it.
trans-unit.target: ولكي تتمكن من العودة إلى الطريق الذي قمت بتسجيله، اضغط على زر التشغيل، ثم اتبع الإرشادات المقدمة لك. إذا رغبت في العودة لاحقا، فيمكنك الرجوع إلى الصفحة الرئيسية ثم قم بتحميل الطريق الذي قمت بحفظه للتو عند رغبتك في العودة له مجددا.

We suggest using the text and voice note buttons to record a text note and/or a voice recording which can help you realign your device to the anchor point you recorded at a later time. trans-unit.source: Clew uses your phone's camera and inertial sensors to track your position as you move around the environment and when you navigate a route. Holding your phone in the correct pose or orientation is essential in order for the app to work correctly. You should hold your phone in the portrait orientation (vertically), with the rear camera facing forward.
trans-unit.note: Text that explains how to orient the phone for the best experience using Clew Paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: It is important to maintain the phone in the vertical pose, with the rear camera facing forward (pointed away from your body) whenever you are navigating or saving a route. Maintaining the phone in this pose helps reduce errors from the app.
trans-unit.note: Text that explains how to orient the phone for the best experience using Clew Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: The following exercise will help you practice holding your phone in the correct pose for Clew. Tap the Practice button to begin.
trans-unit.note: Text that explains how to orient the phone for the best experience using Clew Paragraph 3

trans-unit.source: Now you can practice holding your phone in the correct pose for using Clew. Remember that the rear camera should face forward or away from you.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for practicing holding phone activity paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Begin the exercise by moving your phone from a horizontal pose to a more vertical pose. Your phone will buzz and make a distinct tone the further you are off from the correct pose. You'll then hear a success chime when you achieve the correct vertical pose. Try moving your phone in and out of the correct pose a couple of times to hear the difference.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for practicing holding phone activity paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: Now it's your turn. Tap the Start button to begin.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for practicing holding phone activity paragraph 3
start orient phone practice
stop orient phone practice

trans-unit.source: Nice Job! You now know how to hold the phone in the correct pose. You can keep practicing or go to the next section.
trans-unit.note: Text when user has completed the phone position practice
Title for holding phone practice

trans-unit.source: Try holding your phone against your chest when you're navigating a route to ensure it remains in the correct vertical pose with the camera facing directly in front of you.
trans-unit.note: Tip for holding phone against chest

trans-unit.source: We also recommend that you hold the phone in the opposite hand that you use to work with your white cane or guide dog.
trans-unit.note: Tip for using Clew with cane or guide dog
Tips for holding phone title
Pause

trans-unit.source: You can pause Clew if you want to initiate the return navigation at a later time. Pausing Clew will require you to set an 'anchor point'. The anchor point stores important orientation and directional information and is needed to realign you to the correct path. The following module will teach you how to use anchor points.
trans-unit.note: Instruction for how to pause navigation
Title for the pause navigation section of the tutorial

trans-unit.source: Physical alignment sets the anchor point using the phone's inertial sensors. This method requires you to hold the phone in the horizontal or flat pose with the screen facing up, and press the top (short edge) of the phone against a vertical edge, like against a wall, a doorframe or a table.
trans-unit.note: Text of the physical alignment part of the tutorial paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Press the align button and wait for the countdown. The anchor point will be saved at the end of the countdown.
trans-unit.note: Text of the physical alignment part of the tutorial paragraph 2
Title of the physical alignment part of the tutorial

trans-unit.source: Please send all feedback to the development team through the feedback popover in the Clew app. The feedback popover is accessible by tapping the feedback button in the app. We take your feedback seriously and will do our best to act on it.
trans-unit.target: الرجاء القيام بإرسال الملاحظات إلى فريق المطورين عن طريق خيار ارسال الملاحظات من داخل تطبيق Clew. ويمكن الوصول إلى هذا الخيار عن طريق الضغط على زر الملاحظات داخل التطبيق. نحن نأخذ ملاحظاتك على محمل الجد وسوف نبذل كل ما بوسعنا لتطبيقها والعمل عليها.

trans-unit.source: Providing feedback to the development team
trans-unit.note: this is a section in the help documentation menu

trans-unit.source: Once you are done navigating, assuming you have enabled the "Send Logs" setting, the app will ask you to rate your service. These ratings help us improve the app experience and the app's accuracy. Along with your rating, your phone's path will be sent in the log. Please note that this data is not linked to you in any way and it does not contain any information about the location where the path was recorded (e.g., no GPS coordinates are logged). Further, no images or other sensitive information are logged by the app. If you have any concerns about the data in the logs, please contact us (or simply switch off the "Send Logs" feature in the app settings).
trans-unit.target: عندما تنتهي من التنقل، وعلى فرض بأنك قمت بتفعيل خيار ارسال البيانات، سيطلب منك التطبيق القيام بتقييم الخدمة. تساعدنا هذه التقييمات على تحسين الجودة والدقة في التطبيق. سيتم ارسال مسار الهاتف مع البيانات. ونود إعلامك بأن هذه البيانات ليست مرتبطة بك في أي حال من الأحوال، ولا تتضمن البيانات أي معلومات متعلقة بمكان تسجيل المسار. (لا تتضمن البيانات إشارات GPS ولا تتضمن أي صور أو معلومات حساسة). إذا كان لديك قلق حول البيانات داخل السجلات، الرجاء التواصل معنا (أو قم وبكل بساطة بتعطيل خيار إرسال البيانات من داخل إعدادات التطبيق.

trans-unit.source: As soon as the app launches, the app will present three buttons: save route, single use route, and saved routes list. To navigate a route that you don't need to save, simply press the single use route button and follow the app's instructions. To save a route, activate the save route button. The app will walk you through the process of saving a route by first asking you to create an anchor point. The procedure for creating an anchor point is described later in this document and also through in-app instructions. If at any point you want to cancel an activity and return to this recording screen from any other part of the app, either the home button, or in some cases a “done” button, can be pressed to reset the app status and return to the recording view.
trans-unit.target: عندما يعمل التطبيق، سيعرض لك ثلاثة أزرار مختلفة: حفظ الطريق، استخدام طريقا فرديا، وقائمة الطرق المحفوظة. ولكي تتنقل في طريق ما دون الرغبة في حفظه، قم ببساطة بالضغط على زر استخدام طريق فردي، وتابع إرشادات التطبيق. ولحفظ الطريق، قم بضغط زر حفظ الطريق. وسيرشدك التطبيق بطريقة تسجيل الطريق بالطلب منك أولا القيام بأنشاء نقطة ثابتة. وسيتم تفصيل طريقة انشاء النقطة الثابتة لاحقاً في هذه القائمة، ومن خلال إرشادات التطبيق. إذا كنت ترغب وفي أي وقت بإلغاء نشاطاً ما والعودة لشاشة التسجيل هذه في أي جزء من التطبيق، فيمكن ضغط زر الصفحة الرئيسية أو زر تم للعودة إلى شاشة التسجيل.
trans-unit.note: This is a paragraph in the recording a route section which describes how to record a single use route
This is a section heading in the help documentation menu

trans-unit.source: The app's motion estimates are based primarily on analyzing images from your phone's camera. The app will not work unless your phone's rear camera is capturing images of your environment. The app will not work if the phone is in your pocket or if any part of your body is blocking your phone's rear camera. We have found that the app works best when you hold the phone in portrait orientation with the rear camera facing directly ahead of you and the phone oriented vertically. Other orientations can work, but may result in diminished accuracy.
trans-unit.target: تعتمد تقديرات الحركة في التطبيق على تحليل الصور من كاميرا هاتفك. فلن يعمل التطبيق إلا إذا كانت الكاميرا الخلفية لهاتفك قادرة على التقاط صورًا لمحيطك. لن يعمل التطبيق إذا كان الهاتف في جيبك أو إذا كان أي جزء من جسمك يغطي الكاميرا الخلفية لهاتفك. لقد وجدنا بأن التطبيق يعمل بشكل جيد عندما تمسك الهاتف بشكل عمودي ثم قم بتوجيه الكاميرا الخلفية أمامك مباشرةً. يعمل الاتجاه الآخر أيضا، ولكن من الممكن أن يسبب نقصان في الدقة.

trans-unit.source: Clew allows you to record a route that you can return to at a later time. The Save Routes feature is useful for paths that you want to come back to frequently. The route is stored on your device's memory (and soon on the cloud). You can navigate a saved route from A-to-B and back.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for using saved routes paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: For example, you can save a route at a hotel which could navigate you from the front desk to the elevator and back. Or from the elevator to your hotel room and back to the elevator.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for using saved routes paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: The saved routes menu allows you to load recorded routes and navigate along them in either the forward or reverse direction.

trans-unit.source: The saved routes menu provides you with a list of recorded routes ordered from most to least recent. Once you tap on a route, you can select navigation in "start to end" or "end to start" mode. "Start to end" means that you navigate along the route in the same direction as it was recorded. "End to start" means that you navigate the route in the reverse direction as it was recorded.
trans-unit.target: توفر لك قائمة الطرق المحفوظة قائمة بالطرق من الأكثر طلبا، إلى الأحدث. فعند اختيار طريقا ما، يمكنك اختيار التنقل بوضعين إما التنقل من البداية للنهاية، أو التنقل من النهاية للبداية. فالبداية للنهاية تعني بأنك تتنقل عبر الطريق بنفس الاتجاه الذي قد تم تسجيل الطريق به. أما النهاية للبداية، فيعني بأنك تتنقل في الطريق بشكل عكسي كما تم تسجيله مسبقا.
trans-unit.note: This is a paragraph in the saving routes section of the help menu which describes the process for loading a saved route for navigation.
This is a header in the saving routes section of the help documentation menu

trans-unit.source: You can share routes from this menu either by swiping left (if not using VoiceOver) or by activating the secondary action on the route (if you are using VoiceOver). Pressing on the share button will then open a share selector which lets you share a route over text, email, airdrop, or through many other apps. When sharing a route please be sure that you have entered detailed instructions (either as a voice note or as text) to help the person you are sharing the route with find the route's anchor points. If this person cannot accurately find the anchor points, the app will not provide accurate guidance.
trans-unit.target: يمكنك مشاركة الطرق من هذه القائمة إما عن طريق السحب إلى اليسار (إذا لم تكن تستخدم الVoiceOver) أو عن طريق تنشيط الإجراء الثانوي داخل الطريق (إذا كنت تستخدم VoiceOver). اضغط على زر المشاركة لفتح قائمة المشاركة والتي تتيح لك مشاركة طريق عبر رسالة نصية أو عن طريق البريد الإلكتروني أو عن طريق العديد من التطبيقات الأخرى. عند مشاركتك لطريقا ما، الرجاء التأكد بأنك قد أدخلت تعليمات مفصلة (إما كملاحظة صوتية أو كنص) وذلك لمساعدة الشخص الذي تشاركه الطريق على العثور على النقاط الثابتة داخل الطريق. إذا لم يتمكن هذا الشخص من العثور على النقاط الثابتة بدقة، فلن يوفر التطبيق له إرشادات دقيقة.

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of Clew's navigation and directional guidance relies heavily on you holding and maintaining your phone in the correct 'pose' (the direction which it's facing) when you're traveling along a route.

trans-unit.source: Clew's Automatic Phone Pose & Alignment Correction feature helps correct for any offset or changes to the pose of your phone. It's especially useful for users who have difficulty perceiving their phone's spatial orientation or direction during travel and will make the navigation with Clew more accurate.
trans-unit.note: Determine whether to use the phone body offset correction page text paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: If you enable this feature, we recommend that you maintain your phone in a fixed position, like against your chest whenever you're navigating with Clew.

trans-unit.source: In order to immediately perform return navigation, press the play button and follow the instructions provided. In order to pause the session to perform return navigation at a later point, press the pause button and complete the anchor point procedure.
trans-unit.target: لكي تتمكن من الانتقال لِطريق العودة، اضغط على زر التشغيل، ثم تابع التعليمات. ولكي تتمكن من الإيقاف المؤقت والعودة للطريق لاحقاً، قم بالضغط على زر الإيقاف المؤقت، وتابع عمل النقطة الثابتة.
trans-unit.note: Information displayed to the user on the play pause screen after they have recorded a single use route. This describes the functionality of the play and pause buttons.

trans-unit.source: To be able to resume your tracking at a later point you need to record an anchor point for the end of your route. An anchor point records the position and alignment of your device so the app can reload your route from a temporary file. As a result the accuracy of your return navigation relies entirely on how accurately you can realign and position your phone with your saved anchor point at a later point. We suggest using the text and voice note buttons to record a text note and/or a voice recording which can help you realign your device to the anchor point you recorded at a later time. To create an anchor point, hold your device flat with the screen facing up. Press the top (short) edge flush against a flat vertical surface (such as a wall) the ”align” button starts a %lu-second countdown. The countdown is intended to give you time to position your device; the anchor point will be saved at the end of the countdown.
trans-unit.target: "ولكي تتمكن من متابعة تنقلك في وقت لاحق، يجب عليك تسجيل نقطة ثابتة في نهاية الطريق. تسجل النقطة الثابتة موقع واتجاه الهاتف الخاص بك، فيمكن للتطبيق إعادة تحميل الطريق عن طريق الملف المحفوظ. نتيجة لذلك، تعتمد دقة الطريق المحفوظ على مدى قدرتك على المحاذاة ومطابقة الهاتف مع النقطة الثابتة التي تم تسجيلها.و وننصحك باستخدام زرّي النص والملحوظة الصوتية لكتابة ملحوظة أو تسجيلها لمساعدتك على مطابقة الهاتف مع نفس النقطة التي قمت بتسجيلها. وللقيام بتسجيل نقطة ثابتة: يجب عليك وضع هاتفك بشكل ثابت، ثم وجه الشاشة لأعلى واضغط على الجزء العلوي (الزاوية القصيرة من الهاتف) وسيبدأ العد التنازلي. ويهدف العد التنازلي لمنحك الوقت لإجراء التعديلات النهائية على اتجاه جهازك. وسيتم حفظ النقطة الثابتة عندما ينتهي العد التنازلي."

trans-unit.source: Anchor point saved. You may now close the app and return later for return navigation.

Title for the single use route part of the tutorial

trans-unit.source: Clew's Single Use Routes feature helps you find your way back after going from one place to another. This feature records your path when you walk from point-A to point-B. It then provides you with the return route directions and necessary cues.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for using the single use route paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: For example, you can perform a single use route when going from a lobby area to a room, and then you want to return back to the lobby area.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for using the single use route paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: The Single Use Route allows you to navigate a return route only once. The Save Routes feature allows you to navigate a route multiple times.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for using the single use route paragraph 3
Title for the Siri Walk Through

trans-unit.source: Nice Job! Your Siri shortcuts are now ready for you to use. You can come back to Siri shortcuts to make any changes to the shortcuts at any time by tapping on the Main Menu icon or from within the tutorials.
trans-unit.note: Text for when you complete the Siri shortcut setup
Title for when you complete the Siri shortcut setup

trans-unit.source: The setup will take you to Apple's Siri shortcuts where you'll write the phrase that you want Siri to recall as the voice command. We recommend using short phrases that are easy to remember and are specific to its feature or function. Some suggested phrases are: "End the route", "Clew stop recording the route". Tap the Setup button below to begin.
trans-unit.note: The page text for setting the Siri shortcut for ending the route recording
The page title for setting the Siri shortcut for ending the route recording

trans-unit.source: The setup will take you to Apple's Siri shortcuts where you'll write the phrase that you want Siri to recall as the voice command. We recommend using short phrases that are easy to remember and are specific to its feature or function. Some suggested phrases are: "Return me back", "Clew start return navigation". Tap the Setup button below to begin.
trans-unit.note: Text for setting the Siri shortcut for ending the route recording

trans-unit.source: Tap the Single Use Route button on the home screen to activate this feature. Clew will immediately begin recording your route.
trans-unit.note: Instruction for how to use single use routes paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Now you can navigate to where you want to go. Remember to hold your phone in the correct vertical pose with the rear camera facing forward. Tap the 'stop recording' button once you've arrived at your destination.
trans-unit.note: Instruction for how to use single use routes paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: Tap the 'play' button to initiate the return route navigation. Clew will then guide you back to your starting point.

trans-unit.source: Clew provides waypoints or virtual crumbs to keep you in the right orientation as you navigate the route. The app will play a distinct 'chime' when you pass through a waypoint or virtual crumb.
trans-unit.note: Text that explains the concept of waypoints paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: Sighted users will see a colored crumb in the shape of a map point on the screen. The crumb color can be changed in the settings.
